title: Herald

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Prophesise to a non-Partisan player each night. They gain one use of 90: Jester’s ability.
- Channel vengeance the night after a Partisan is hanged, dealing a redirect-immune Unstoppable attack to a player. You may only do this once.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You can talk with the dead at night.
- All messages sent by you appear to be sent by “The Voice of the Sun”.
- Players killed by abilities you give appear to have been killed by a 2442: Herald’s follower.

desc:
Post 2442
*As it rises, the sun shall change the world and reward its faithful.*
